article_title: An insurer’s Obamacare grade: passing, but barely
article_text:
Blue Cross Blue Shield CEO Brad Wilson says his company is still evaluating whether it will stop offering Obamacare policies in North Carolina

How can the ACA improve? He has recommendations

article_metadata.news-keywords: Obamacare, Affordable Care Act, Blue Cross Blue Shield, Brad Wilson, UnitedHealth
article_metadata.description: Blue Cross Blue Shield CEO Brad Wilson says although his company is losing millions on Obamacare, it should be fixed, not repealed.
article_metadata.title: An insurer’s Obamacare grade: passing, but barely | The Charlotte Observer
